title: Tile
inscribed:
Written inscription in relief under turquoise blue glaze.
زان ببارید نم
The complete text of this poem is:
از ابر بهاران ببارید نم              ز روي زمین زنگ بزدود غم
The poem is from Shahnameh Ferdowsi, story “ Kaykhosrou was King for sixty year”  part I.
the end part of this poem: زنک بزدود غم 
Appears on tile 42.212.58 in this museum.
The Inscription read by Abdullah Ghouchani
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Horace O. Havemeyer

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
